description_0: A motorcycle rider is in the action of doing a jump high up in the air, with the rider going in a backwards direction like a back flip from the motorcycle while holding on to the motorcycle with his right hand. The motorcycle rider is wearing a red and white full body suit. The motorcycle is black. In the background is an indoor stadium with people in every row except the left back corner.
description_1: A person is hanging on to a motorcycle in mid air. The person's hands are gripping the handles of the bike, while their feet are elevated above the bike. The bike is facing toward the top right corner of the image, while the top of the person's shoulders are facing the right side of the image. The person's back is flat, and their head seems to be looking toward the bottom right corner of the image. They are wearing a helmet and a red, white, and blue body suit. In the background is a stadium of people spectating. The stands in the stadium are split into a lower section that covers the bottom of the image, and a few rows of a higher section going across the top of the image. There is a white wall above the higher section of stands.
